name: Morbid Cruelty - Samudaripen - CD, MC
description:
Second full-length album by Chilean old-school death metal duo Morbid Cruelty, now available in the US on Remorseless Records.

9 tracks of ripping old school riffs, inspired by the classics with their own added flair. 44 minutes of delicious death metal, including a cover of the legendary Mefisto.

For fans of: early Pestilence, Deicide, Morbid Angel (Formulas Fatal to the Flesh era), etc.



Note: This is a pre-order; CDs and tapes are expected to ship by the end of October, specific date TBD. Any order containing a pre-order will not be shipped until all items are in stock.

name: Mass-49 - No Longer Human - CD, MC
description:
Debut EP by Indonesian death-grinders Mass-49, available on CD and tape by Remorseless Records

7 tracks of blistering death grind, packed with riffs, blasts, and everything nasty. The band has really made a name for itself with this release and their near-constant touring, and their music is now available stateside for the first time

name: Mosara - Rumour of a Funeral - CD, MC
description:
The latest offering by the atavistic doom veterans from Phoenix, Arizona, on CD and tape by Remorseless Records. These four massive tracks combine hammering and groove laden rhythms with wretched and bleak layers of sound.

The emotion that secretes from the sonically remorseless and lengthy psalms is palpable. Founding member Tony had this to say: "This is the album that we dug deep on. Two years of my own personal turmoil, the band banging our heads against the wall and against each other, clawing, writing, and writing until we dug deep into the depths of our talent and still dug deeper. I consider this our proudest moment and can't wait for everyone to listen to it."

name: Exhumación Profana - MCB&P - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Colombian duo Exhumación Profana, available on CD and tape from Remorseless Records. 9 tracks of chaotic, warlike, and profane material! Exhumación Profana plays music with pure energy, embodying the violent and warlike atmosphere that envelopes Colombia. Founded in late 2019, they've made a name for themselves by touring various cities across the country. They call themselves "Old Skull" Metal, paying tribute to the victims of the armed conflict, the internal war, and the bloody history that defines us.

name: Vile Apparition - Malignity - LP
description: The highly anticipated sophomore full-length by Melbourne's death metal quartet Vile Apparition. Mechanically precise drumming violence and crazed riffs fire you into an onslaught of malevolent extremity with intense, guttural vocals spewing through the mix. The ruthless aggression shown from the very beginning will transport you back to the brutality of the 90s with a modern twist showcasing only the most gruesomely barbaric ideas from the band.

name: Filth - Time to Rot - LP
description: Debut full-length by the rotten German trio Filth. Fouling the air with a disturbing ambience, the disquiet of this record leads into a gloomy and sepulchral yet bludgeoning offering of death metal. Abhorrent riffing and ghastly vocals mold together in foul fashion atop powerful drums, creating a fetid atmosphere of swirling, mid-paced groove

name: Cancer Void - First Metastasis - LP
description: Debut EP by the new Czechian death metal band Cancer Void, presented on a single sided 12" slab of wax. Featuring a bevy of sinewy riffs, massive drums, and plenty of varied rhythms, this is a fantastic introduction by the new group and hopefully a sign of things to come

name: Décryptal - Simulacre - LP
description: Debut full-length by Quebec's Décryptal, featuring 8 tracks of monolithic death metal over 38 minutes. Drawn out passages of charnel guitars and battering drums showcase a superbly classic take on death metal with mean-spirited vocals snarling through the abyssal mix. Atmospheric yet punchy, creating the perfect mix of gruesome death metal

name: Ossuary - Abhorrent Worship - LP
description: After a couple demos and an EP, Madison, Wisconsin's Ossuary present their much-anticipated full-length debut. Featuring 6 massive tracks of death metal brutality over 37 minutes, these guys pulled no punches. Ominous and tense with eerie riffs, savage drumming, and snarling, vicious vocals deliver exactly what was promised - powerful, dark, gloomy death metal

name: Hyperdontia - Harvest of Malevolence - LP
description: The latest full-length by the Danish/Turkish death metal supergroup Hyperdontia. Proficient as ever, these guys continue to crush with their bludgeoning brand of old school sounds, featuring devastating riffs, intricate bass lines, pulverizing drums, and otherworldly vocals - the kind of death metal you can really sink your teeth into.

name: Septage - Septic Worship - LP, MC
description: The new (and seemingly only) full-length by the Danish death metal/goregrind goons Septage. 15 tracks of absolutely putrid, rancid, festering disgustingness. Featuring Malik of Hyperdontia fame on bass, the groove of these tracks is undeniable, and fits right in with the gurgling vocals and the swampy, sticky production. Short leads pop in from time to time to prevent things getting too dank, before diving right back into the fetid death metal madness. This one is undoubtedly for the gorehounds out there but will be a welcome addition for fans of old school death metal as well.

name: Cryptworm - Reeking Gunk of Abhorrence - LP
description: The classic 2020 EP by the putrid UK death metallers Cryptworm, re-issued on a blue 45RPM 12". Festering and grotesque, yet catchy as all hell, this EP really set the stage for the albums to come.

options.name: Cryptworm - Reeking Gunk of Abhorrence - LP

name: Reverence to Paroxysm - Lux Morte - LP, MC
description: Debut full-length from Mexico City death/doom and gloom masters Reverence to Paroxysm. Monolithic and massive, the album hits like a ton of bricks right from the jump. Atmosphere like the inside of a tomb, melancholic melodies, and expansive arrangements, the themes explored here are fleshed out beautifully. Earth-shattering bass, pounding drums, rancid vocals, and catchy buzzsaw riffs, this one's got everything you could possibly need.

name: Ascendency - A Manifest of Imperious Destiny - LP
description: Second EP by Danish black/death trio Ascendency presented on a 45rpm 12" slab of blood red wax. Darker and more venomous than their Danish contemporaries, while still maintaining that signature death metal brutality

options.name: Ascendency - A Manifest of Imperious Destiny - LP

name: Incinerated - Lobotomise - LP
description: The highly acclaimed sophomore effort by Melbourne, Australia's brutal death/grind quartet Incinerated, repressed on neon green vinyl courtesy of Me Saco Un Ojo Records. Swirling, grindy riffs, lightning-fast blasts, and super low gutturals, Incinerated pull no punches. With 14 tracks crammed onto this slice of wax, you're going to feel like your brains been scooped out by the time you get to the end.

name: Sedimentum - Suppuration Morphogénésiaque - LP
description: Debut full-length of grotesque death metal by Quebec's Sedimentum, presented on wax in a gorgeous gatefold sleeve. Featuring a chunky blend of overdriven bass, gut-splitting guitars, skull-pummeling drums and absolutely gargantuan vocals, these 7 tracks hit hard - this one is surely not for the faint of heart

name: Chaotian - Effigies of Obsolescence - LP, MC
description: The latest full-length by Copenhagen heavyweights Chaotian, on cassette tape and 12" vinyl. It seems the word "cavernous" is everywhere in death metal these days, but it certainly suits this release in every way. Massive riffs, booming drums, vocals dripping with reverb, and to top it all off, amazing bass lines that can be heard clearly in the mix. It's hard to get this style of death right and maintain enough variety to keep a listener engaged for a whole album, but Chaotian has managed to pull it off.

name: Undergang - De Syv Stadier af Fordærv - LP
description: 2023 EP by the Danish masters of death and decay, Undergang, presented on a 45rpm 12" record. Absolutely crushing and tight as always, these 7 tracks traverse the 7 stages of decomposition of a rotting corpse - exactly the type of subject matter one would expect from the dripping, oozing, gurgling sounds

options.name: Undergang - De Syv Stadier af Fordærv - LP

name: Ataraxy - Revelations of the Ethereal - LP
description: The debut album by Spain's Ataraxy, repressed and finally available once again. Originally unleashed upon the underground scene in 2012, this monumental debut full-length stands as a testament to the band’s raw beginnings, still maintaining its position as their most aggressive and intensely crafted death metal offering to date.

options.name: Ataraxy - Revelations of the Ethereal - LP

name: Astriferous - The Lower Levels of Sentience - LP
description: 2020 EP by the Costa Rican death dealers Astriferous. Toeing the line somewhere between old-school and new, the 4 tracks contained on this 45RPM slab of wax bridge that gap beautifully. Bleak and bottomless death metal with a nice, crisp deathgrind edge to the production, the esoteric themes explored within suit the sound perfectly.

options.name: Astriferous - The Lower Levels of Sentience - LP

name: Undergang - Til Døden Os Skiller - LP
description: The sophomore release by the Danish defilers of death, repressed on slime green vinyl. Taking a noticeable step towards more mature, traditional song writing from their debut, Til Døden Os Skiller presents a more streamlined and digestible slab of putrescence, all while maintaining the festering ooze and bowel-shaking vocals of it's predecessor. 8 tracks over 47 minutes of the skull-smashing, doom-ridden, headbanging old-school death metal we've all come to know and love.

options.name: Undergang - Til Døden Os Skiller - LP

name: Gorephilia - Severed Monolith - LP
description: Sophomore full-length by Finnish death metallers Gorephilia, repressed and finally available again in all its glory. 10 killer tracks of Morbid Angel style riffage, blast beats, sludgy atmosphere, and all-around intense, ambitious, crushing death metal

name: Phrenelith - Desolate Endscape - LP
description: The debut full-length by the Danish death-metallers Phrenelith. Featuring veterans of the Danish scene, including David Torturdød (Undergang, Sequestrum, Hyperdontia, etc.) and (as of the time of this album) Tuna on drums (Sulphurous, Hyperdontia, etc.), these guys clearly knew what they were setting out to do, and pulled it off expertly. Huge, cavernous soundscapes filled with menacing tremolo riffs and punishing mid-paced drumming, the title of this album is apt and sums up the atmosphere perfectly.

name: Purulent Spermcanal / Impetigo - Split - CD
description: Split album featuring 2 absolute legends of sick deathgrind. 13 big hits by Spain's Purulent Spermcanal, re-recorded for the occasion, and another 8 of Impetigo's best, fully remastered and presented as never before

name: Catasexual Urge Motivation - The Encyclopedia of Serial Murders - 2CD
description: Legendary 1996 ablum by Japan's death metal/goregrind duo Catasexual Urge Motivation, re-released and featuring both the original album as well as a fully remastered version. 22 tracks totaling an hour of brutality, crammed onto both discs.

options.name: Catasexual Urge Motivation - The Encyclopedia of Serial Murders - 2CD

name: Organic Brain Disorder - Gruesome Acts of a Deranged Mind - CD
description: Debut full-length by the one-man death metal/goregrind project Organic Brain Disorder. 11 quick and punishing tracks squeezed into 16 minutes, featuring ripping riffs, pulverizing beats, and of course sick, deranged vocals

options.name: Organic Brain Disorder - Gruesome Acts of a Deranged Mind - CD

name: Pigtsy - Pignations - CD
description: The latest (fifth) full-length by Czechian deathgrinders Pigsty. Back again and bigger than ever, this time with 8 pulverizing tracks in about 33 minutes.

name: Melancholy Pessimism - Butchery is Our Strategy - CD
description: Latest full-length by the Czechian experimental deathgrind legends Melancholy Pessimism. On this 9th album, they continue to bring the heat with 11 crushing tracks over 46 minutes of brutality

options.name: Melancholy Pessimism - Butchery is Our Strategy - CD

name: Sodomic Baptism - Contra Christum - CD
description: Latest full-length by Belarus' death metal trio Sodomic Baptism. This album is a full-scale war of satanic brutal death metal, delivering nine crushing tracks infused with apocalyptic intensity, masterful riffing, and bone-shattering percussion.

name: Intumescence - Alliance of Depravity - CD
description: Compilation by Netherlands goregrinders Intumescence, presented on a clear, record style CD in a gatefold sleeve. Featuring 5 tracks originally from the 2008 lathe-cut 8" split with CSMD, and 6 bonus tracks from the 2003 split with Malignant Tumour, all newly remastered in 2025 and presented together for the first time

name: Anatomical Amusements - Rare Exhibitions - CD
description: 2024 EP by Japanese death metal/goregrinders Anatomical Amusements. For fans of old Carcass and featuring vocals/strings by the Pharmacist himself

name: Repugnance - Perpetual Deviousness Vol. 1 - CD
description: Part 1 of the Complete Recordings Collection, bringing 20 tracks from "The Final and Never Released Recordings From 2001", "The Sadistic Deviousness...Demo 1993", "The Unreleased Ep 1994", and "Perpetual Penitence. Demo 1991".

name: Repugnance - Perpetual Deviousness Vol. 2 - CD
description: Part 2 of the Complete Recordings Collection, bringing all the tracks from "Maximum Perversum 2000", "Ghoulish 1996", and "Find My Axe. Live Demo 1995" as well an Impetigo tribute and a Regurgitate tribute

name: Repugnance - Retrieving Dead Bodies - CD
description: 2024 EP of new material by Spanish old school horror deathgrind legends Repugnance, featuring tracks not found on the collected works compilations.

name: Decomposing Serenity - Unpleasant Harmony as I Lick Your Casket - CD
description: Compilation album by Nevada's goregrind project Decomposing Serenity, featuring tracks from 8 different splits over the years plus a solid handful of previously unreleased material

options.name: Decomposing Serenity - Unpleasant Harmony as I Lick Your Casket - CD

name: Liquid Viscera / Egggore / Lipoma - 3-way Split - CD
description: 3-way split album of nasty grind by 3 heavyweights. 3 quick rippers by the Texan duo Liquid Viscera, 8 nasty tracks by Czechia's Egggore, and another 6 malignant masses by the US gorehounds Lipoma.

options.name: Liquid Viscera / Egggore / Lipoma - 3-way Split - CD

name: Mivedantal - Gallery of Human Perversity - Cd
description: Latest album after 15 years by Czechia's brutal gore deathgrinders Mivedantal. 10 lightning-fast tracks in 31 minutes, for fans of Mortician

options.name: Mivedantal - Gallery of Human Perversity - Cd

name: Haemorrhage - Emetic Cult 3.0 - CD
description: The 1995 debut album by Spain's pathological goregrind cult, meticulously re-recorded for the 30th anniversary, preserving and celebrating that legendary classic

name: Soul Massacre - Feast for Kings - CD
description: Latest full-length by Czechia's old school death metallers Soul Massacre. 10 crushing tracks in 41 minutes of crunchy guitar riffs, tight, pounding drums, and big, beastly vocals tied together with a nice tight production.

options.name: Soul Massacre - Feast for Kings - CD

name: Noisy Neighbors - Insolvent - CD
description: Latest full-length album by the Texan d-beat grindcore outfit Noisy Neighbors, featuring 16 ripping tracks in 30 minutes, by members of Liquid Viscera.

name: Din-Addict / Noisehole Project / Abortion / Schism - 4-way Split - CD
description: 4-way split album featuring 66 tracks of fast and furious grind. 22 tracks by Hungary's Din-Addict, 14 by the US/Mexico Noisehole Project, 6 bangers by Slovakia's Abortion, and another 24 to close it out by the international Schism.

options.name: Din-Addict / Noisehole Project / Abortion / Schism - 4-way Split - CD

name: Repugnance - Complete Works Bundle
description: 3-CD bundle featuring all available recordings by Spain's deathgrind legends. Bundle includes the Perpetual Deviousness compilations volumes 1 and 2, as well as the Retrieving Dead Bodies EP from 2024, all together at a discounted rate. Available while supplies last

name: Chestcrush - ΨΥΧΟΒΓΑΛΤΗΣ - LP, CD, MC
description:
CHESTCRUSH emerges from the abyss with their highly anticipated sophomore album, ΨΥΧΟΒΓΑΛΤΗΣ. A Greek term that literally translates to 'Soul Extractor’ and is metaphorically used to describe a person or experience that torments you so deeply it feels as though it pulls the very essence of your being out of your mouth, choking you in your own toxic vomit of repressed trauma and suppressed hatred.

This disgustingly heavy full-length album is available on all formats, imported directly from the band. The vinyl is available in clear white smoke and clear black smoke, while the cassette format comes with a slipcase. All copies include a digital download code.

name: Utumno - Across the Horizon - MC
description: Classic 1993 album by Swedish death metal legends Utumno, re-released on a full-body UV print cassette via Into It Records. Featuring 6 massive tracks of melodic yet gritty Swedish death deliciousness.

name: Crypt Feeder - Into the Crypt - MC
description: Debut EP by British death duo Crypt Feeder, featuring two crushingly heavy tracks of cosmic death metal. Buzzsaw HM2 riffs a la Swedish legends Entombed or Dismember.

options.name: Crypt Feeder - Into the Crypt - MC

name: Masacre - Barbarie y Sangre en Memoria de Cristo - MC
description: Classic 1993 EP by Colombian death masters Masacre, re-released by Into It Records on a full-body UV print cassette tape. Crushing, as always, Masacre brought a heaping helping of doom to these 4 massive tracks, making the blasty death metal sections even more powerful.

options.name: Masacre - Barbarie y Sangre en Memoria de Cristo - MC

name: Sigmantra - Hallucinogenic - CD
description: Debut EP by Chile's stoner doom trio Sigmantra, on a digipak CD. 4 fat tracks of fuzzed out doomy goodness, stretched over 26 minutes. Absolutely stuffed with groovy, head-banging, psychedelic riffs.

name: Pendulvm - Llano de Tumbas - CD
description: Debut EP by Chilean death/doom project Pendulvm, presented on digipak CD. Dark, brooding doom, interlaced with faster death metal sections a la Asphyx or Winter. Crushing riffs, powerful bass and drums, and some sick, snarled vocals dripping in reverb.

name: Sangria - Esclavo de la Ira - CD
description: Latest full-length by Chilean sludge/doom trio Sangria, 11 years since their previous release. Powerful, driving doom riffs with the anger and oppressive atmosphere of sludge, paired together for a pulverizing 40-minute ride through the bleakest corners of the mind.

options.name: Sangria - Esclavo de la Ira - CD

name: Sepolcro - Abyssal Death Metal 2011-2018 - 2CD
description: Double CD compilation of works by Italy's Sepolcro, combining their 2 previous demos, tracks from the split with Presumed Dead, some live recordings, and a couple of previously unreleased tracks - everything the band had written up until 2019's debut EP.

name: Black Curse - Burning in Celestial Poison - LP, CD, MC
description:
In the wise words of Frank Cotton, "Jesus wept."
The follow-up album to the 2020 black/death masterpiece "Endless Wound", this sophomore effort by Denver's Black Curse is the opposite of a slump. Launching out of the gates with blazing guitars and skull-crushing blasts, this 45-minute hell-raising cacophony firmly solidifies this arcane four-piece as some of the top dogs in the game.

name: Skinless - Progression Towards Evil - CD
description: The debut full-length by upstate New Yorkers Skinless. 9 tracks over about 34 minutes of extremely catchy classic brutal death metal. The production allows the bass to be heard clearly in each track, setting the groove while the chuggy riffs and tight drumming bring it all together. The CD is housed in a special edition slipcase.

name: Larvae - Arousal of the Crawling Creature - MLP
description: The latest EP by Italian death/doom trio Larve, pressed on a single-sided 12" vinyl, with the reverse side featuring a glow in the dark screen-printed logo. Heavy and brooding, Larvae perfectly capture that crushing, cavernous sound, complete with dripping, gory vocals.

options.name: Larvae - Arousal of the Crawling Creature - MLP

name: Gutless - High Impact Violence - LP, MC
description: Debut full-length by Australia's new underground death metal maniacs, Gutless, available on 12" vinyl and cassette tape. High Impact Violence is exactly the type of skull-crushing brutality you would expect, having improved in every way from their already impressive demo and split with Mortal Wound from 2020. Visceral riffs, bludgeoning blast beats, thick bass lines, grisly vocals, and the occasional searing guitar leads - these guys have managed to dial in their sound and seem very willing to beat you over the head with it.

name: Mutagenic Host - The Diseased Machine - CD, LP
description: Debut full-length by the UK death metal cyborgs Mutagenic Host. Presumably cooked up in a state-of-the-art black site laboratory, this slab of sci-fi horror hits all the sweet spots of old-school death metal with some modern hints of hardcore and technical riffage. Presenting as an "allegory for the systematic industrialization of humanity’s eradication", Mutagenic Host has created an epitaph of epic proportions - can't wait to see what these maniacs think of next.

name: Putred - Megalit al Putrefac​ț​iei - CD
description: Sophomore full-length by the gory Romanian death metal gang Putred. Full of ominous soundscapes and primitive yet dynamic riffage, Putred evoke the mid-paced sections of pioneer bands such as Death and Obituary, while creating a plodding momentum of their own.

name: Blunt Knife Castration - Live Fast Die Slow - CD
description: Blunt Knife Castration presents the new album ‘Live Fast Die Slow’ available on CD via Remorseless Records. The album features 10 tracks of grooving sludge, blasting crust punk and straight up metal around lyrical themes of self-loathing, obsession and pure hatred for mankind.

options.name: Blunt Knife Castration - Live Fast Die Slow - CD

name: Cryptic Brood - Outcome of Obnoxious Science - LP
description: Second full-length by the German death/doom trio Cryptic Brood. Foul, stinking death metal with pulverizing drums, a thick, clangy bass, groovy, catchy riffs, and putrid dual-attack vocals - with clear influences ranging from Autopsy to the more modern sounds of Undergang and Anatomia, what more could a sicko ask for? Presented on transparent toxic sludge vinyl in a beautifully painted gatefold sleeve, with a 12" insert and download code.

options.name: Cryptic Brood - Outcome of Obnoxious Science - LP

name: Mortal Wound - The Anus of the World - LP, MC
description: Debut full-length by the LA lunatics Mortal Wound, available on 12" vinyl and cassette tape. This album is the perfect combination of crushing metal and seamless storytelling. Weaving in and out of various samples between and during songs, this will take you on a 40-minute trip through the seediest parts of the Vietnam War

name: Brodequin - Harbinger of Woe - CD
description: The brand-new masterpiece by Tennessee legends Brodequin. 20 years after their previous album, the masters return and provide possibly their best material to date. Retaining their raw and pulverizing sound, the production allows each instrument to shine, combining everything for a crushingly brutal assault. Uncompromising in their vision, this is the perfect medley of brutal blasting, catchy grooves, flowing rhythm, and overall excellent brutal death metal. The CD comes housed in a special edition slipcase.

name: Profanator - Mvtter Vicivm - CD
description: Full-length album by Mexico's crusty, blackened, grindy thrash band Profanator. Tough to classify, easy to enjoy - countless catchy riffs and groovy rhythms while the vocals have just the right amount of menace in their delivery.

name: Smallpox Aroma - Festering Embryos of Logical Corruption - CD, MC
description: First full-length album by Thailand's gross grinding trio Smallpox Aroma after over a decade and half of demo, split, and live releases. Nasty, putrid, slimy, lightning fast grindcore - this studio album was well worth the wait.

name: Triumph - Retaliation Warfare - CD, MC
description: Sophomore effort by Reno NV's Triumph, this 8-track, 35-minute epitaph is the perfect successor to 2020's debut. Featuring all of the individual elements that made the previous album so great, tied together into a more cohesive whole with a slightly less jagged production.

name: Savage Deity - Decade of Savagery - CD, MC
description: Third full-length album by Thailand's' Savage Deity, released in 2021, a full 10 years after their first rehearsal recording. Opening with perfect old-school death metal riffs and production, you know exactly where this one is taking you. Catchy, tight riffs, plenty of blast beats, ripping leads, classic death metal vocals - an excellent release from the quartet.

name: Ancient Malignity - Ancient Malignity - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by Nevada's black/death trio Ancient Malignity. Featuring members of other killer projects such as Triumph, Ritual Genocide, and Blasphemous Creation, these guys don't need much of an introduction. Featuring 9 tracks in about 29 minutes, this one is short, sweet, and directly to the point - no fluff or filler to be found here

name: Ancient Malignity - Dehumanization Dawn - CD
description: Sophomore release by the black/death trio from Nevada, Ancient Malignity. Tighter and slightly more accessible than their debut, this album clocks in with 10 tracks in about 37 minutes. Blasty and oppressive, this one takes the raw, grindy guitar tone and punishing drumbeats and pairs them with thick, layered vocals to give everything a dirty, sludgy feel while maintaining the high ferocity this style of music is synonymous with.

name: Reincarnated - Of Boötes Void Death Spell - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Thai death/doom quintet Reincarnated. These guys must have been playing death/doom in their past life too, because this album covers a lot of territory and seems almost too massive - or perhaps it's the long resume of bands each member has been a part of: Nocturnal Damnation, Savage Deity, Oldskull, to name a few. Expertly weaving in between slow, sustained riffs and the faster tremolo sections with soaring leads, these guys check all the boxes of a great death/doom album and more.

name: Triumph - Edict of Iron Ascendency - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Reno NV solo black/death project Triumph. The main man behind this assault, Immolator, takes plenty of inspiration from the likes of Revenge - and manages to do it some serious justice. Absolutely crushing drums and rhythms, with a guitar tone that sounds like a serrated blade meeting a chainsaw, and some painfully raw vocals - if you like your death metal jacked up and ready to go to war, look no further.

name: Ritual Genocide - Ascension Death Mass - CD
description: Debut full-length by Reno's black/death war machine Ritual Genocide. This is nasty, brutal, raw fucking metal, not for the faint of heart. Drums that will pummel you into a fine ash, thick, heavy bass forward in the mix that will crush your skull, raw, grinding guitars that will numb your senses, and to top it off, low, evil vocals that will have you questioning your own existence. In other words, the perfect combination for some sick shit.

options.name: Ritual Genocide - Ascension Death Mass - CD

name: Morbosidad - Tortura - CD
description: EP by the longtime Bestial Black/Death band Mobosidad. Featuring 4 songs in 14 minutes, Thomas Stench and the gang pulled no punches on this short slab of brutality, and you will find no frill or fluff amongst these passages. Brutal, ripping riffs and blast beats aplenty, there's a reason Morbosidad has been in the upper echelons of this style for so long.

name: Sepolcro - Amorphous Mass - MC
description: Debut EP by Italian death metal trio Sepolcro. Heavy, raw, and with an absolutely massive atmosphere - these guys somehow sound like the culmination of many different styles of death metal while also managing to sound incredibly unique.

name: Oldskull - Nether Hollow of No Return - CD
description: Debut full-length by Thailand's aptly named OSDM group Oldskull. A classic blend of catchy, aggressive riffage, blasting drumbeats, grooving basslines, and raw, growled vocals. Featuring 9 tracks in about 46 minutes, these guys managed to capture in this album the very soul of death metal.

options.name: Oldskull - Nether Hollow of No Return - CD

name: Intricated - Apocalyptic Metamorphosis - MC
description: Sophomore full-length album by Thailand 4-piece brutal death metallers Intricated. 10 tracks in about 33 minutes of groovy riffs, punchy snare drum blast beats, low guttural vocals, and earth-shattering bass lines. This is some of the catchiest BDM I've heard in quite some time.

name: Thornspawn / Maledictvs - Guided by Vengeance & Bloodlust - MC
description: Split release by Texan black metallers Thorspawn and the solo Mexican project Maledictvs. Two fast, blasty, raw, and abrasive tracks on the Thornspawn side which have some elements of death metal hidden in the mix. The two tracks on the Maledictvs side build up a massive, ominous atmosphere, leaning heavily into the blasphemous side of black metal.

options.name: Thornspawn / Maledictvs - Guided by Vengeance & Bloodlust - MC

name: Smellcorpses - Slaughter Still Continues - MC
description: Raw, grinding D-Beat from Chiang Mai, Thailand. Harsh, blasting, and straight to the point, 6-track EP in about 8 1/2 minutes.

name: Hacavitz - Nex Nihil - CD
description: Full-length album by Mexico's black/death quartet Hacavitz. Leaning more into the blackened side of things, this is probably the last release by the band many would still consider to contain death metal. Atmospheric but still containing plenty of catchy riffs to grab onto, with tortured, echoey vocals and quick, blasty drumming.

name: Chainfight - Chainfight - CD
description: Debut EP by the Thai hardcore/metal group Chainfight, featuring 6 tracks in about 18 minutes. Combining elements of death metal and grindcore with old school hardcore punk, this album will teleport you back to the glory days of early 2000's mosh pits and breakdowns.

name: Siamese Brutalism Bundle
description:
Siamese Brutalism is a community of musicians and bands based in Thailand who stick together in order to share an experience in extreme metal music among each other and spread the words of Thai underground extreme metal music scene. This bundle explores a range of styles by this collective, from death/doom to grindcore and everything in between. Available while supplies last

Includes 4 CDs:
Reincarnated - Of Boötes Void Death Spell
Savage Deity - Decade of Savagery
Oldskull - Nether Hollow of No Return
Smallpox Aroma - Festering Embryos of Logical Corruption

name: Sijjin - Helljjin Combat - LP, CD, MC
description: Sophomore full-length by the German/Spanish death thrashers Sijjin. Leaning a bit more into the thrashy side of things, especially in the opening tracks, this feels like the guys coming into their own sound and departing from the style they stuck to when they played in Necros Christos. 8 tracks in just under 49 minutes, full tight drumming, snarled vocals, driving basslines, and some of the catchiest riffs around.

name: Necros Christos - Triune Impurity Rites - CD
description: The debut EP by Germany's most evil death/doom band, released in 2007 after a few years of demos, splits, and an EP release. This album (as with most of their catalog) is some of the darkest, wicked, and intense occult death/doom out there. Utilizing plenty of brief interludes of acoustic passages, spoken word segments, and organ music to build an eerie atmosphere, the setup for the songs proper goes far in separating the band from other so-called occultists. The songs themselves are some of the best death/doom around, and you would be quite remiss to overlook this gem.

options.name: Necros Christos - Triune Impurity Rites - CD

name: Necros Christos - Nine Graves - CD
description: 2014 album by the German masters of the occult, Necros Christos. Though technically an EP, this one clocks in at about 40 minutes with the atmospheric, world-building interludes these guys have been known for. While the evil and occult is what makes this band stand out the most, the metal tracks on this EP are some of the catchiest they've ever released, without giving up any of the charm of their past releases.

name: Concrete Winds - Concrete Winds - LP, CD
description: The highly anticipated 3rd full-length album by the true masters of madness Concrete Winds. This 9-track, 25-minute self-titled release somehow manages to contain the barbaric, deranged chaos that Concrete Winds spew forth. Jam-packed with more riffs than should be humanly possible, and capturing shrieks and blast-beats from the beyond, this manic masterpiece takes no prisoners. Just one look at that cover art should show you just how unhinged this album is - don't say you weren't warned

name: Sijjin - Sumerian Promises - LP, CD
description: Born from the corpse of Necros Christos, Sijjin unleash their first full-length, Sumerian Promises, a thrashy epitaph of death metal madness. Playing much faster than the previous incarnation, Sijjin utilize catchy, twisting death metal riffs and thundering, driving drumbeats to build a powerful, oppressive atmosphere. The low raspy vocals and thundering bass harken back to the olden days of death metal, setting the stage for ripping guitar solos. Primitive yet modern, feral yet technical, this is a debut you don't want to miss.

name: Black Curse - Endless Wound - LP, CD
description: Debut full-length by the Denver black/death demons Black Curse. Formed by members of Blood Incantation, Spectral Voice, Primitive Man, Khemmis (I could go on), expectations for this new group were high - and they certainly did not disappoint. Clearly rooted in death metal, they also brought in elements of black and doom, creating a destructive and brutal sound that enraptures and astounds.

name: Horns of Domination - Where Voices Leave No Echo - LP, CD
description: Debut full-length by the German genre-benders Horns of Domination. Expertly fusing death, black, doom, and a bit of thrash, these veterans of various scenes create a new sound which fits in perfectly with the relatively clean production. Strong riffs and melodies build the atmosphere, allowing for each individual element to shine in its own light. The 6 very strong tracks are separated by 2 equally as compelling instrumentals, creating a 35-minute, 8-track soundscape that reveals new elements with each listen.

name: Concrete Winds - Nerve Butcherer - LP, CD
description: Second full-length by the furious Finns Concrete Winds. The perfect follow-up to Primitive Force, their sophomore effort picks up right where it left off - aggressive, unhinged, and unrelenting. Certainly not for the faint of heart, this is no cheap imitation - these 10 tracks are a true force to behold and will certainly leave your nerves frayed if they manage to stay intact at all.

name: Concrete Winds - Primitive Force - LP, CD
description: Debut full-length by the Finnish force of nature Concrete Winds. Abrasive and raw, the duo takes all that is great about death metal and adds grind and noise influences to form their signature blend of "death noise". Everything from the riffs to the production is woven together beautifully into an unhinged assault which will leave you wanting more and more. The short 25-minute runtime plays into that nicely, as you're going to want to spin this again as soon as it ends.

name: Concrete Winds - Discography Bundle - 3LP, 3CD
description: All 3 full-length albums by Finnish psychopaths Concrete Winds. Get the entire discography and save ~15%, available on CD or vinyl while supplies last.

name: Disgorge - Parellels of Infinite Torture - CD
description: Fourth (and hopefully not last) full-length by the Californian death metal band Disgorge. Release prior to their lengthy and ongoing hiatus, they at the very least went out with a bang. Absolutely brutal with erratic drumming, grinding circuitous riffs, and guttural vocals - this album will pummel your eardrums with a blunt object for almost a full 44 minutes, leaving you begging for more.

options.name: Disgorge - Parellels of Infinite Torture - CD

name: God Macabre - The Winterlong - CD
description: Classic 1993 debut by the Swedish five-piece, re-released in all its glory. Up there musically with the likes of Entombed or Dismember, God Macabre is one of those sadly oft overlooks pioneers of the early Swedeath scene. Boasting plenty of chainsaw riffs and breakneck tempos, there's also gloomy, melancholic passages interspersed to keep things interesting. Unfortunately, the only LP we were graced with from these guys. Presented in a special edition slipcase.

name: Evil Incarnate - Blackest Hymns of God's Disgrace - CD
description: Debut full-length by the angry Americans from Illinois. Hate-filled, visceral riffage and an ominous, blasphemous atmosphere are on full display here. Add to that some sinister vocals, punchy tight drums, and rhythmic grooving basslines, and we have the staple sound of evil death metal. 11 tracks over 31 minutes, this one provides plenty of headbanging groove without overstaying it's welcome.

options.name: Evil Incarnate - Blackest Hymns of God's Disgrace - CD

name: Evil Incarnate - Waiting for His Return - CD
description: Sophomore release by the Illinois trio, featuring 8 tracks in 31 minutes. Classic old-school death metal with that perfect 90's era production. Full of catchy minimalist, heavily distorted guitar riffs, driving bass, thundering drums, and low growled vocals. Strange grindy tempo changes and abrupt transitions give this album that massive, evil, blasphemous atmosphere.

options.name: Evil Incarnate - Waiting for His Return - CD

name: Evil Incarnate - Depopulation Agenda - CD
description: The third full-length by the hateful trio from Illinois. Nasty, violent, visceral death metal, with no frills, and no bullshit. Crushing tempos, endless blasts, and shredding riffs, these guys continue to do what they do best - and couldn't give a fuck what anybody thinks.

name: Cryptic Dissolution - Morbific Reminiscences in Physical Forms - CD
description: Debut full-length by the Russian trio Cryptic Dissolution. With crushing mid-tempo riffage and plenty of blast beats and gurgling vocals, Cryptic Dissolution is sure to make a name for themselves in the death metal scene. Short and sweet clocking in around 22 minutes, and presented in a jewel case with obi strip.

options.name: Cryptic Dissolution - Morbific Reminiscences in Physical Forms - CD

name: Teratoma - Purulent Manifestations - CD
description: The first (and to date only) album by the German quintet Teratoma. Launching out of the gate with brutal growls, grinding guitars, and a nice tight rhythm section, Teratoma waste no time letting you know what they're all about. Short and sweet with 6 tracks in just over half an hour, there is no filler to be found on these bones, only tasty, tender meat.

name: Guts - Nightmare Fuel - CD
description: Sophomore effort from the Finnish five-piece, featuring 11 tracks in 43 minutes of groovy, old-school death metal. Full of buzz-saw guitar riffs, thundering bass and drums, and low, growling gutturals. A nice additional to their short catalog, we can only hope these guys stick around and keep gracing us with this level of goodness. Presented in a jewel case with obi strip.

name: Pissgrave - Malignant Worthlessness - CD
description: The third album in the trilogy of Pissgrave's titles, Malignant Worthlessness is a welcome addition. Heavier and tighter than ever before, the brutality and depravity of these Philadelphian miscreants is on full display. Not much else needs to be said about this one.

name: Purulent Remains - Worm-Eaten Corpse - CD
description: Compilation album bringing together the Stages of Decomposition EP with the Fermented Death EP, plus a previously unreleased bonus track. The result is this 10-track festering slab of Panamanian goregrind. Fetid, rotten, and groovy as all hell, this maggot-filled mass should adequately curb your appetite.

name: Mausoleum - Defiling the Decayed - CD
description: Latest full-length by the Pennsylvanian gorehounds Mausoleum, presented in a slick 6-panel digipak. Throat-ripping, thoroughly decomposed death metal of the old school variety - exactly what the doctor suggested you avoid. Full of groovy riffs and fetid lyrics, this album will transport you right back to the glory days of 90's era putridity.

name: Defeated Sanity - Chronicles of Lunacy - CD
description: The latest (and dare I say greatest) album by the German masters of brutal, technical death metal Defeated Sanity. Full of all those things that make them so good - blast beats, tempo changes, technical riffs, slams, ping snare, you name it - all melded together into the perfect slab of brutality. As good as these guys have been for the past 3 decades, it's astonishing that they continue to put out such compelling albums.

options.name: Defeated Sanity - Chronicles of Lunacy - CD

name: Severe Torture - Torn from the Jaws of Death - CD
description: New full-length by the Dutch old-schoolers Severe Torture. Hard to believe it's been 14 years since their previous release, but you wouldn't know it by listening - these guys have not skipped a beat. These 10 tracks in a tight 38-minute runtime offer a refined and sophisticated, yet versatile and brutal, death metal experience.

options.name: Severe Torture - Torn from the Jaws of Death - CD

name: Wormed - Omegon - CD
description: The latest full-length offering by Spain's brutal/technical death metal maestros Wormed. Coming a quarter of a century after their first demo, these guys have managed to put together an incredible resume of all killer no filler metal for longer than most bands even hope to be around. This time around, the 9 track, 41-minute runtime is full classic Wormed riffs, low brutal vocals, pounding bass breakdowns, and even a bit of added tremolo riffage.

name: Just Before Dawn - An Army at Dawn - CD
description: Fourth full-length album by the Swedish warmongers Just Before Dawn. With 10 tracks and almost an hour of runtime, the album features a devasting rhythmic battery with monstrous riffs and tastefully somber leads. Without a dedicated lead vocalist, the album offers a wide range of talent through multiple guest spots, giving each song a unique feel. This South American edition CD comes in a jewel case with obi strip.

options.name: Just Before Dawn - An Army at Dawn - CD

name: Death Thrash Attack!
description:
3 CD bundle of delicious death/thrash that is sure to get your blood pumping! Available while supplies last

Bundle includes:
Savage Ruins - World in Wrath
Force of Darkness - Heritage of Dark Incantations
Sijjin - Helljjin Combat

name: Aberratio - Thanatos - CD
description: Sophomore full-length by the Brazilian death metal quattro Aberratio. Mixing traditional death metal with themes of philosophical and historical exploration of death. With 9 tracks boasting a 48-minute runtime, Aberratio perfectly nail the old-school style, while the open mix gives the feeling of a live performance. Presented in a jewel case with a special edition slipcase.

name: Lebbra / Putred - Valley of the Putrid Lepers - CD
description: Split album by Italy's Lebbra and Romania's Putred, featuring 3 tracks by each. The Lebbra half boasts 3 new songs of their hard to define black/death hybrid with some thrash and doom mixed in in equal measure. Putred's tracks offer up 3 new tracks of their nasty, vile, Autopsy inspired death metal. The perfect combination for a sticky, humid, rainy day.

options.name: Lebbra / Putred - Valley of the Putrid Lepers - CD

name: Dead Awaken - The Princip Legacy
description: The second full-length by Sweden's death metallers Dead Awaken. Coming in 8 years after their debut, the trio spent a long time writing and fine-tuning this release, resulting in a tight 9 tracks over 32 minutes. Foregoing the traditional Swedish sound, Dead Awaken opted instead for a more classic OSDM sound, with loads of double bass and palm-muted riffage.

name: Carnation - Cursed Mortality - CD
description: The latest full-length offering by Carnation of Belgium, Cursed Mortality boasts 8 tracks over a 35-minute runtime of vicious HM-2 death metal. Full of face-melting riffage and soaring leads, Carnation managed to reach new heights of creativity with this album. From the skull-splitting drumming to the bowel-shaking bass, this one will rattle your very soul.

name: Houwitser - Damage Assessment - CD
description: Fourth full-length by the Dutch goon squad Houwitser. Apparently unsatisfied with their previous release (not sure why, it's a banger), the boys set out to make a brutal, more cohesive album. Featuring 8 tracks in 31 minutes of blast beats, ripping riffs, and some sick Predator samples, they achieved their goal and some.

name: Houwitser - Rage Inside the Womb - CD
description: Third full-length by Netherlands based Houwitser. Ripping, tearing, face-shredding death metal pushing close to the BDM side of things, but still maintaining enough classic death metal riffage to appeal to the purists. 10 tracks over 31 minutes of blasting, shredding excellence.

options.name: Houwitser - Rage Inside the Womb - CD

name: Fulci - Duck Face Killings - CD
description: The latest full-length by the Italian brutal death metal madmen Fulci, this time inspired by the classic giallo The New York Ripper directed by their namesake. Leaning into the concept, Fulci weave a story over 14 tracks of groove, blasts, and growls, briefly making way for samples and keyboard interludes as they are known to do. These guys have been putting out some seriously head-bangable jams for over a decade now, and this album is a welcome addition to their catalog.

name: Dripping Decay - Festering Grotesqueries - CD
description: Debut full-length by the Portland, Oregon based quartet Dripping Decay. Taking classic old school ideas and adding some modern bells and whistles, these guys have spewed out a head-banging, face-melting, gut-tearing behemoth of grindy death metal. 14 tracks over 37 minutes, this one is an instant classic. The CD comes housed in a special edition slipcase with an obi strip.

name: Old School Tape Bundle
description:
3 classic old school albums, re-released and available again on the classic format. Available while supplies last.

Bundle includes:
Masacre - Barbarie y Sangre en Memoria de Cristo
Wombbath - Brutal Mights / Several Shapes
Utumno - Across the Horizon

name: Dripping Decay - Ripping Remains - CD
description: The second and final release by the short lived but supremely talented Dripping Decay comes in the form of the EP Ripping Remains. Earworm riffs and spectacular tone combine for 17 minutes of devastating death metal. Occasionally leaning into the grinding side of things, these guys seem to have perfect control over their instruments - it's a shame they weren't around for longer.

name: Pure Unadulterated Evil Bundle
description: 3 CDs by the hateful and blasphemous boys from Illinois, Evil Incarnate. Includes their first 3 full lengths: "Blackest Hymns of Gods Disgrace", "Waiting for His Return", and "Depopulation Agenda", together at a great price.

name: Diabolizer - Murderous Revelations - LP
description: The Turkish titans return with their second full-length, Murderous Revelations. 8 tracks in 39 minutes of absolutely savage riffage, blasting drums, and massive, monstrous vocals. Ripping guitar leads light up the songs, perfectly complementing the rhythmic battery and demonic atmosphere. This album marks a significant entry in 2025 death metal - not one to be missed!

name: Morbific - Bloom of the Abnormal Flesh - LP, CD
description: The third and latest full-length album by the Finnish death trio Morbific. Another brilliant offering of the filthy and dripping death metal they've become known for, Morbific does not skimp of the riffs, filling the 44.5 minute, 11 track run time to the brim with festering, groovy, death metal madness.

name: Phrenelith - Ashen Womb - LP, MC
description: The Danish heavy-weights return with their highly-anticipated third full-length album. Horrifying and massive right from the start, this album provides a soundtrack to a world on fire. Destructive drums, ripping riffs, and vitriolic vocals - perfectly performed death metal. The occasional slowed down doomy section provides a juxtaposition to the blast beats, making each section that much more powerful.

name: Stenched - Purulence Gushing from the Coffin - LP, CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Mexican one-man death metal project Stenched, available on all formats. Following a well-received demo in 2023, the maniac known simple as Adrián has compiled 8 new tracks into a behemoth of an album. Filthy, oozing death metal with groovy riffs and super low guttural vocals - headbang inducing from start to finish.

name: Faceless Burial - At the Foothills of Deliration - LP
description: The third full-length by Australian death metal trio Faceless Burial. Featuring 6 tracks in 37 minutes, these lads launch out of the gate with ripping riffs and demolishing drums. Brutal vocals join the fray, culminating in a massive death metal sound which is second to none.

options.name: Faceless Burial - At the Foothills of Deliration - LP

name: Vacuous - Dreams of Dysphoria - LP
description: Debut album by London's Vacuous, featuring 7 tracks in 32 minutes of gloomy, spectral, atmospheric death metal. Monstrous sounding guitars and bass open with pounding drums, making way for reverb-drenched vocals. Absolutely bludgeoning in their delivery, Vacuous waste no time in showing their skills.

name: Undergang - Misantropologi - LP
description: The fourth full-length by the Danish masters, repressed and available once again courtesy of Me Saco Un Ojo Records. 10 tracks of tasty, trudging, mid-paced death metal complete with guttural growls and blast beat breaks. Some of Undergang's catchiest songs appear on this album, proving they are here to stay.

name: Ossuary - Supreme Degradation - LP
description: The classic 2019 demo by US death metallers Ossuary, repressed by Me Saco Un Ojo records. Malicious and unrelenting, Ossuary present a violent experience, channeling the ferocity of true old school death metal into four soul-crushing tracks over 25 minutes. Triumphant and scathing, this is a demo for the ages.

name: Fleshrot - Unburied Corpse - CD
description: Debut full-length by the Texan quartet Fleshrot. Pummeling, mid-paced death metal, dripping with Southern-fried reverb and chunky, chuggy riffs. Fully embracing the style of rotten death metal, influences including the likes of Autopsy and Incantation show up clearly, making this hybrid blend of old-school and new a worthy entry into the annals of filth.

name: MKDELTA - Dogma CD
description:
Latest EP by NYC sludge trio MKDELTA, available on CD via Remorseless Records

Featuring 3 vitriolic tracks over 24 minutes of intricate instrumentation and poignant social commentary, this EP truly couldn't come at a better time

name: Devoured Death #666
description: Devoured Death zine issue 666 from Victoria, Australia. 76 pages overflowing with interviews and reviews, covering the best in underground death metal.

name: Lamenting Satanas - Invocations - CD, MC
description: The sophomore full-length album from anonymous blackened death metal band, Lamenting Satanas. “Invocations” marks an evolution in Lamenting Satanas’ dynamic and abrasive sound, weaving in folk-inspired passages, classical guitar, and an eclectic array of instruments—including tablas, steel tongue drums, lutes, lamellophones, rainsticks, and various custom percussion. This progression, paired with their signature scorching riffs, pummeling drums, and venomous, razor-sharp vocals, offers a refreshing take on a genre in dire need of revitalization. While maintaining the coldest wave of frozen atmosphere throughout, the album reaches its peak with the final track, 'Invocations: Light Take Me,' a 10-minute epic closer that is as captivating as it is grandiose. With “Invocations,” Lamenting Satanas summons a storm of sound and spirit—both a reckoning and a revelation in the evolving pantheon of extreme music!

name: Lamenting Satanas - Scorn - MC
description: Scorn is the debut full-length album from the anonymous blackened death metal outfit, Lamenting Satanas. Blending the ferocity of second-wave black metal with the melodic heft of Swedish death metal, this record delivers an intense auditory assault. The themes of Scorn revolve around the self-inflicted darkness of humanity—exploring death, disease, condemnation, and the twisted cycle of hatred and sacrifice. With every riff and growl, the album paints a grim picture of the horrors that define our existence, capturing the essence of violence and despair in its rawest form.

name: Forest Thrall - Amidst Pines - CD
description: Forest Thrall is the horned raw black metal shamanism of singular member Tri Súil, whose three eyed assault of sonic reverie has unchained a potent host occult pagan audial incantations since its exhumation. Hailing from the North American land of New England, Forest Thrall has wrought a driving multifaceted melodic experience of enigmatic black metal mania, one tinged with ambient folk lamentations and anti-modernity defiance. With the dauntless Amidst Pines, Forest Thrall has proven itself one of the stalwarts of USBM and beyond, finding freedom through perdition.

name: Theoden's Reign - Mitheithel - CD
description: From the creative mind of Heralder, "Mitheithel" by Theoden's Reign marks the debut chapter to a world of atmospheric black metal excellence. Heralder has an extensive background in the craft of black metal and aims to expand artistic horizons with a fantasy-driven approach. Incorporated in this release is a list of medieval & archaic instruments alongside the punch of raw & melodic black metal. The lyrical content is an infusion of Tolkien’s writing & personal creativity.

name: Black Theatre - Dreams of Time - MC
description: Black Theatre is marriage between dungeon synth and dreamy soundscapes from the mind of Max Brigham (Cloak). “Dreams of Time” is a dark sonic journey through dreams and nightmares over the course of six instrumental tracks. Recorded during the Winter of 2021 with minimal equipment, cold textures and melodies carry the listener across 33 minutes of ambient dream music.

options.name: Black Theatre - Dreams of Time - MC

name: Koviria - Coronatio Corvorum - MC
description: Koviria is a folk/black metal duo from North Carolina formed in 2022 by Elanti (drums/vocals/bass/flute) and Galadtir (guitars/synthesizers). Inspired by topics such as nature, folklore, and history, their sound can primarily be categorized as a combination of folk metal, atmospheric black metal, and thrash metal. With a foundation of cold-ferocious riffs, accented by majestic melodies, Koviria creates a dark yet cathartic atmosphere.

name: Plague Patrol / Sewer Fiend - Split - LP
description: Split LP by the Czechian OSDM band Plague Patrol and the UK death/doom duo Sewer Fiend. Side A contains 2 huge tracks by Sewer Fiend full of dripping, oozing, gargantuan riffs with pummeling drums, groovy bass, and ghoulish vocals. Side B contains 3 unrelenting horror-filled tracks of classic death metal, full of vicious riffs and dreadful vocals.

options.name: Plague Patrol / Sewer Fiend - Split - LP

name: Demo Tape Bundle
description:
4 modern demos, released the old school way. Discover the sounds of the underground. Available while supplies last.

Bundle Includes:
Ritual Execution - Demo 2024
Taxidermia - Demo 2023
Envoys - Glimpe Beyond the Veil Demo 2024
Jagadjagal - Demo 2025

name: Perilaxe Occlusion / Fumes / Celestial Sanctuary / Thorn - Absolute Convergence - LP
description: 4-way split LP featuring a killer track each by Perilaxe Occlusion, Fumes, Celestial Sanctuary, and Thorn, pressed on hot-pink vinyl

options.name: Perilaxe Occlusion / Fumes / Celestial Sanctuary / Thorn - Absolute Convergence - LP

name: Ritual Execution - Demo 2024 - MC
description: Debut demo by the UK death metal trio Ritual Execution. Featuring 3 brutal tracks over about 12 and a half minutes, these mysterious lads waste no time showing what they're about. Thick and oozing, these tracks spew forth a blend of primal percussive blasts and ripping riffage, tied together with a triple vocal attack.

name: Dromos - Dromos - MC
description: The absolutely crushing debut EP by UK funeral doom group Dromos. Equal parts melodic and massive, this monstrous display is a perfect introduction, and I'll certainly be awaiting what comes next.

name: Rotten Entrails - As the Slurry Consumes - CD
description: Debut full-length by the Brazilian death metal maniacs Rotten Entrails. Featuring 51 minutes on 10 tracks, these guys present a blend of old school distorted riffs with drippy, cavernous vocals, creating a sound which could fit in with any era of death metal. Varied drumming and ripping guitar leads prevent any sort of monotony, making the long runtime feel just right.

options.name: Rotten Entrails - As the Slurry Consumes - CD

name: Ecocide - Metamorphosis - CD
description: The second full-length by the Dutch death/thrash group Ecocide. A full 10 years from their debut, Ecocide return with their incredibly catchy riffs and old-school sounds, squeezing 9 killer tracks into 34 minutes. Notably influenced by pioneering Dutch bands such as Pestilence and Asphyx, these guys capture those tried-and-true sounds and push the envelope further into a fast frenzy of thrashy madness.

name: Apparition - Disgraced Emanations from a Tranquil State - CD
description: The latest explosion of death metal from the California quartet Apparition. The perfect blend of old-school Incantation style death metal, with a modern proggy lean similar to the early days of Tomb Mold.  An aptly fitting title, as this nearly 40-minute album is anything but tranquil.

options.name: Apparition - Disgraced Emanations from a Tranquil State - CD

name: Necrotum - Defleshed Exhumation - CD
description: Third full-length by the Romanian maniacs Necrotum, featuring 9 tracks in 36 minutes which sit somewhere between tech, prog, and old-school death metal. Brutally heavy and unpredictable, the trios sound reminds of classic Cryptopsy or Suffocation with some more modern Tomb Mold style proggy parts mixed in. A major step forward in experimentation and instrumentation from their much simpler earlier works.

name: Devotion - Astral Catacombs - CD
description: Third full-length by the death metal quintet Devotion from Valencia, Spain. Tight and simple riffing sets the stage on these 10 tracks, laying the foundation for blasting drums, brutal vocals, and chilling melodies by the lead guitars. Classic ODSM style with a pummeling and uncompromising momentum.

name: Intolerance - Waking Nightmares of an Endless Void - CD
description: Sophomore album by the Spanish death metal quartet Intolerance. Face-ripping, skull-crushing death metal featuring memorable riffs and searing leads, these guys waste no time in letting you know what you're in for. The murky atmosphere and harrowing vocals compliment the raw, gritty production exceedingly well, making this a for-sure repeat listen.

options.name: Intolerance - Waking Nightmares of an Endless Void - CD

name: Morbus Grave - Feasting the Macabre - CD
description: The latest full-length offering by Italian death metallers Morbus Grave. Sick, damp, bloody, and disgusting, these 5 lunatics take the slimy sounds of their debut and kick it up a notch, leaving us with this festering slab of madness that would make the boys in Autopsy blush. All this adds up to a somehow catchy and groovy half hour of death metal deliciousness.

options.name: Morbus Grave - Feasting the Macabre - CD

name: Krypticy - The Non-Return - CD
description: The second (and unfortunately probably final) full-length by death metal gang Krypticy from Spain. Incredibly catchy riffs and charismatic vocals over blasting drums make it impossible to not bang your head for the majority of these 36 minutes. For fans of any era of death metal, this one really has a timeless sound.

name: Reckless Manslaughter - Sinking into Filth - CD
description: The fourth full-length by long standing, uncompromising German death metal quintet Reckless Manslaughter. Pure brutal old-school death interspersed with doom parts and bone-crushing blasts, these guys have taken their influences from Bolt Thrower and Cannibal Corpse and molded them into their own signature and iconic sound. The mid-paced melodies throughout are enough to pummel you down and have you begging for more.

options.name: Reckless Manslaughter - Sinking into Filth - CD

name: Mystic Charm - Shadows of the Unknown - CD
description: Classic 1994 full-length by the Dutch death/doomers Mystic Charm re-issued courtesy of Memento Mori Records. Shadows of the Unkown opens with slow, atmospheric soundscapes and gradually buildsx into the crushingly heavy mid-paced death metal that burrows deep into your brain and sticks with you for weeks.

options.name: Mystic Charm - Shadows of the Unknown - CD

name: Coffin Lurker - Foul and Defiled - CD
description: The debut and currently only output from the Dutch death/doom duo Coffin Lurker, available for the first time on CD courtesy of Memento Mori. As damp, murky, and foreboding as the cover art, these 5 plodding tracks of Spectral Voice style atmospheric death doom may very well suck your soul down into the rotting soil, to be trampled underfoot for all eternity.

options.name: Coffin Lurker - Foul and Defiled - CD

name: Concrete Icon - Voracious Streams - CD
description: The latest (third) full-length by Finnish death metal quartet Concrete Icon. Lightning fast and laden with tasty pinch harmonics, the new lineup has breathed fresh breath into their sound, making for a thicker, slimier approach than their previous offerings.

name: Ataudes - Tempus Edax Rerum - CD
description: Sophomore release by the Argentinian black/death trio Ataudes. Powerful and atmospheric, Ataudes take a huge leap forward over their already impressive debut album, utilizing dissonant phrasing and experimental timing, evoking that huge, crushing, atmospheric barrage that's reminiscent of Immolation or Incantation.

name: Insineratehymn - Irreverance of the Divine - CD
description: The Los Angeles death metal quartet Insineratehymn return with their third full-length, Irreverance of the Divine. Classic OSDM with a Swedish tone but an American style. Riff after riff after riff of punch you in the mouth death metal.

options.name: Insineratehymn - Irreverance of the Divine - CD

name: Eyemaster - Conjuration of Flesh - LP
description: Debut EP by the German death metal trio Eyemaster on bright pink vinyl! Featuring 4 tracks in roughly 20 minutes, these guys managed to pack a massive amount of old-school Swedish style death into a small package. Complete with chainsaw tone, soaring leads, and brooding, doomy segments, Eyemaster perfectly captures that malevolent early 90's feel. Vinyl includes 12" insert and download code.

name: Haemophagus - Stream of Shadows - LP
description: Third and final full-length by the Italian grinding death trio Haemophagus. 14 tracks of catchy riffs, air-tight drumming, and some of the most unhinged lyrical themes you're likely ever to hear. It may be best said by the band themselves: "'Stream of Shadows' is a relentlessly unpredictable multi-colored bullet piercing through molten layers of brain matter." Vinyl includes a 12" insert, A3 poster, sticker, and download code.

name: Filthdigger - Filthdigger - LP
description: Self-titled compilation by the Norwegian old-school death metal crew Filthdigger, bringing together 6 riff-filled tracks from previous demos/splits and including a cover of the classic Autopsy track "Ridden with Disease". Classic no-frills death served up on a 12" platter, complete with art insert and download code.

name: Cryptic Brood - Necrotic Flesh Bacteria - MC
description: The latest full-length by German death/doomers Cryptic Brood, on hand-numbered pink shell tapes. As sick and twisted as their previous efforts, but noticeably more unhinged, these guys have fully embraced their vision and released some of the most visceral and grotesque death metal out there.

options.name: Cryptic Brood - Necrotic Flesh Bacteria - MC

name: Depression / Repuked - Split - LP
description: Split LP by German death/grinders Depression and the Swedish filthy death metallers Repuked. The Depression side features 4 new tracks of sticky, dripping death in the vein of Autopsy, plus a cover of...Autopsy! The Repuked side serves up 4 new tracks of their nasty, sickening death in the vein of Autopsy! Autopsy worship has never sounded so good, yet so disgusting. Presented in a very cool double-sided cover sleeve with a 12" insert and download code.

name: Sepulchral Curse - Deathbed Sessions - MC
description: EP by the Finnish blacked death quintet featuring 3 killer original tracks and a Demigod cover. Swirling and atmospheric guitars layered over pounding drums and bass, completed with low death metal style vocals. Haunting and harrowing, this 24-minute EP is a perfect glimpse into what makes Sepulchral Curse so special.

name: Blunt Knife Castration - 2 CD Bundle
description: Both killer albums by Blunt Knife Castration available on CD at a discounted price. Includes the debut Chewed Up and Spat Out, plus the brand-new follow-up Live Fast Die Slow. Treat yourself to some good ol' sleazy sludge, and revel in the misanthropy

name: Pyres - Yun - CD
description: Sophomore album by the Canadian progressive sludge quartet Pyres. After over a decade of silence, Pyres returns with 7 tracks in 48 minutes of furiously energetic - and equally emotional - melodic sludge. Incorporating influences from High on Fire, Baroness, Mastodon, and Pallbearer, this one covers a lot of ground. This Digipak CD includes a download code for a Hypaethral Records sampler.

name: Föhn - Condescending - CD
description: Debut full-length by the funeral doom trio Föhn, hailing from Athens, Greece. Featuring 4 crushing tracks spanning nearly a full hour, Föhn takes you on an achingly haunting journey, steeped in the essence of midnight and the whispers of urban life. Packaged in a 6-panel Digipak, the CD includes a download code for a Hypaethral Records sampler.

name: Nepenthe - The Fading Promise of Tomorrow & Elegies of Loss and Doom - CD
description: Compilation featuring the new EP "The Fading Promise of Tomorrow" as well as the 2020 debut release "Elegies of Loss and Doom". Nepenthe's unique sound blends doom, black metal, post metal, goth rock and more, drawing from a number of influences, and has earned them considerable recognition in underground circles. The CD includes a digital download code.

options.name: Nepenthe - The Fading Promise of Tomorrow & Elegies of Loss and Doom - CD

name: Absorb - Smog - CD
description: The latest EP by Canada's sludgy doom quintet Absorb. Featuring 3 tracks in 25 minutes, this EP marks a profound evolution for the band, embracing denser, more atmospheric compositions that add new layers of depth to their monolithically heavy sound. With a haunting, dissonant atmosphere, intense vocal delivery, and huge, thunderous riffs, this one will pummel you to the core. CD is housed in a digipak, and includes a download code for a Hypaethral Records sampler.

name: Qaalm - First Light of the Last Dawn - CD
description: 2024 EP and highly anticipated follow up to their debut album, "First Light of the Last Dawn" ushers in a new era for the doomy LA powerhouses. Introducing influence from black metal and prog, the reinvigorated Qaalm is more dynamic than ever. This 3-track EP offers a wide range of sound and style and even includes a cover of Black Sabbath's "Heaven and Hell". Presented on a Digipak CD, with a digital download code.

options.name: Qaalm - First Light of the Last Dawn - CD

name: Hemorrhoid - Raw Materials of Decay - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Portland death/grind goons Hemorrhoid on CD and tape. Festering, rancid, and raw - yet groovy as all hell - the trio offer up 15 tracks of manic, blasting goregrind, rife with riffs and searing solos. If barely controlled chaos and sticky, drippy death are your bag, this one will be hard to overlook.

name: Human Corpse Abuse - Xenoviscerum - MC
description: Debut full-length by the US death/grind duo Human Corpse Abuse presented on cassette with a special edition slipcase. Gory, gooey, grinding death complete with a billion riffs and head crushing assortment of drum blasts. 3 distinct styles of vocals are present throughout the album, creating a maddening blend of swirling chaos.

name: Anharat - Deathcult Resurrection - CD
description: Debut full length by the New Jersey based death/doom project Anharat. This may very well be the death/doom sleeper hit of 2023. A beautiful mix of somber and eerie without ever crossing too far into gothic territory, this is an excellent display of blackened doom and death metal melded into a 43 minute monolith. Earworm tremolo riffs lead into ambient chord passages, slowing the listener down to enjoy every transition. Truly a release that deserves more attention.

name: Decorticate - Conditioned by Violence - CD
description: What do Copenhagen residents do when they're not making death metal? They make powerviolence of course! Decorticate manage to cram an incredible amount of amazing raw, grindy aggression into 13 minutes of sonic violence. If this album doesn't have you moshing in your living room, you might need to get your head checked

name: Human Compost - Descendants of Evil - CD
description: 2nd full-length by the Ontario-based death/grind goons Human Compost. 38 minutes of gory, grindy, groovy death metal featuring blast beats aplenty and those sick gurgled vocals you know and love. Alongside the chaotic and unrelenting pace of drumming, the guitar and bass riffs are well thought out and catchy, even delving into the occasional high-flying solo. This album also features guest spots by guitarist Aaron Whitsell of Cropsy Maniac, giving further credence to their commitment to horror and gore.

options.name: Human Compost - Descendants of Evil - CD

name: Chaotian / Deiquisitor - Split - CD
description: Two Danish death metal heavyweights join forces to unleash this coordinated assault of monolithic madness. Starting off with Chaotian's ruthless brand of brutality, the first 3 tracks will pummel you senseless, full of crushing grooves and rancid riffs. Deiquisitor follows up with 4 tracks of their existentially crushing, apocalyptic onslaught, heavy enough to drive the most stoic among us to madness. With both bands at the top of their game, this is a match made in the bleakest pits of hell.

name: Pustilence - Beliefs of Dead Stargazers and Soothsayers - CD
description: The debut full-length by the Australian Pustilence. 45 minutes of some of the sickest death metal riffs, blast beats and guttural vocals. Swinging between chuggy, Bolt Thrower riffs, and soaring, epic leads, this album remains at a high level throughout its entirety, and showcases some of the best Brisbane has to offer.

options.name: Pustilence - Beliefs of Dead Stargazers and Soothsayers - CD

name: Elitist - A Mirage of Grandeur - MC
description: Debut full-length by Danish death metallers Elitist. Lightning fast and technical, this quattro shows off an impressive range and unmistakable proficiency over 8 killer tracks. Punishing riffs, pulverizing drums, groovy bass, and a throat searing vocal attack all combine to create a completely crushing sound full of burrowing earworms.

options.name: Elitist - A Mirage of Grandeur - MC

name: Malformed - The Gathering of Souls - CD, MC
description: First EP by the Finish death metal virtuosos Malformed. 5 tracks in 17 minutes featuring an air-tight rhythm section, catchy and technical riffs, impressive solos, and vocals that would fit into any era of death metal. With song writing chops like those on display here, these guys are going to be powerhouses for years to come.

name: Broder - Skarpretterfossilet - CD, MC
description: Second full-length by the Danish death/sludge duo Broder. Dense and gritty with a blackened edge, this album is as compelling as it is terrifying. Punchy, tight drums, groovy riffs soaked in reverb, and the tortured vocals of a half-eaten corpse, these 31 minutes will take you on a journey to the deepest pits of hell

name: Blind Monarch - The Dead Replenish the Earth - LP, MC
description: Sophomore full-length by the Sheffield UK doom titans Blind Monarch. Featuring 4 crushingly heavy tracks in about 45 minutes, these guys expertly showcase their blend of earth-shattering doom and mournful melodies. Recorded in near-freezing temperatures, this release is equal parts somber and caustic.

name: Seep - Hymns to the Gore - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the putrid death/doom project from Maine on CD and tape. Sticky and gory, this behemoth plods along, creating the perfect mix of BDM and doom. Occasional blasting keeps the feeling of unsettling dread barely contained, leaving the listener to wonder if they're to be chopped to pieces at any moment.

name: Miasmatic Necrosis - Apex Profane - CD, MC
description: If you're at all familiar with the world of goregrind, I would be shocked if you have yet to hear of Miasmatic Necrosis. This 22-minute, 21-track showcase of gurgling, grimy grind is exactly what the doctor ordered. Downtuned guitars drowned in distortion coupled with surgically precise drums, these short tunes will have you hooked. Fair warning though - you might need a shower when you're done listening

name: Blunt Knife Castration - Chewed Up and Spat Out - CD
description: The debut album by UK horror sludge project Blunt Knife Castration, released on CD by Remorseless Records. Sleazy and misanthropic, this is 46 minutes of groovy doom riffs, death metal aggression, punk rock attitude, and sick horror samples, all tied together with vitriolic, throat-searing vocals. Seamlessly flowing from haunting stoner riffs to full-bore tremolo picked death, each of these 8 tracks is catchier than the last. Taking inspiration from the horror movies and video nasties of the 70s/80s, this album will take you on a journey through the darkest and most depraved corners of mankind.

options.name: Blunt Knife Castration - Chewed Up and Spat Out - CD

name: Continuum of Xul - Voratore - CD, MC
description: Debut full-length by the Italian death metal maestros Continuum of Xul. Featuring 9 tracks in 39 minutes of angular tremolo riffage, blasting drums, battering bass, and blasphemous vocals. Fast as it is catchy, this album settles in that sweet spot between technical, brutal, and progressive death metal.

name: Fulminate - Internal Degradation - MC
description: Technically a demo release, Internal Degradation plays like a full-length with 15 tracks over 31 minutes of gooey, gory, grinding death. Opening with a Dead Infection cover, Fulminate make it clear where their influences lie before launching into their lightning-fast original tracks. Settling into that goregrind groove, these guys bounce from riff to riff like it's nobody's business

name: Taxidermia - Devouring Abstractions - MC
description: The newest EP by the Italian metal maestros Taxidermia. With their sound completely dialed in, this tape delivers 4 tracks of punchy, concise death metal. Plenty of frantic tremolo riffs, a blasty rhythm section, and ripping leads make excellent usage of the chainsaw tone and semi-clean production. Reaching almost into melodeath territory at times, this one is packed with headbanging groove.

name: Poisonous - Doomed Pillars - MC
description: The latest EP by the blasphemous Brazilian death metal band Poisonous on cassette tape. Classic old-school stylings and plenty ripping guitar leads, these guys have created another epitaph of excellence

name: Sunken Temple - Abysmal Invocations - MC
description: Debut EP by the Italian death/doom project Sunken Temple. Slow, plodding, pulverizing riffs, driving drums and basslines, perfectly growled vocals. This 4 track, 27 minute monolith keeps the head banging, while occasionally crossing over into funeral territory

name: Blood Offer - Into Evil Rites - MC
description: Debut EP by the Italian Death/Thrashers Blood Offer on cassette tape. Opening with a sinister organ intro, this EP quickly launches into whiplash fast death metal riffs, channeling the thrashy influence that was prevalent in the earliest days of the genre. Dark and gritty, yet razor sharp, this one is a blast from start to finish

name: Leprovore - Horrorreahction - MC
description: Debut demo by the Brazilian Leprovore. Classic old-school death metal reminiscent of the early 90's South American style. Catchy mid-tempo segments make way for blasting, tremolo riffs, and clattering basslines.

name: Taxidermia - Demo 2023 - MC
description: Debut demo by the Italian death metallers, Taxidermia launched onto the scene with a vengeance. 3 tracks of ripping riffs and catchy mid-tempo grooves, it didn't take long for these guys to come into their sound.

name: Special Region of Yogyakarta Bundle
description:
Limited edition bundle featuring both of the December Double Feature tapes, housed in a custom printed drawstring bag along with some extra goodies. This is limited to 25 hand-numbered bundles, and is priced the same as buying both tapes individually.

Bundle includes:
•Jagadjagal - Demo MMXXIV cassette tape
•Drain Death - Merciless Of Doom cassette tape
•Custom die-cut stickers of each band logo
•Remorseless Records sticker and pin
•Download codes for both albums from Bandcamp
•Custom printed, hand-numbered cloth drawstring bag

name: Rötual - Wörms - CD, MC
description: Debut EP Wörms by the Ottawa/Gatineau Death/Doom dealers Rötual, on CD and cassette via Remorseless Records Rötual burst onto the scene, featuring veterans of many Canadian acts, stripping down their combined experience to create something entirely new. The result encompasses the groovy riffs of doom with the heavy, head-banging ferocity of death metal, melded together into compact slabs of mid-pace (de)compositions. The EP dives in headfirst, opening with ear-worm riffs and pulverizing drums and bass, setting the stage for powerful vocals. The EP also includes two French alternative versions of songs to be found on the forthcoming full-length album. Short and sweet, the infectious nature of Rötual's sound will earn them a well-deserved spot at the forefront of the death/doom scene.

name: Undergang - Aldrid I Livet - LP
description: The fifth full-length by the Danish masters of filth on 12" vinyl.
